Notebook para ajuste dos arquivos para o biblioshiny

```{r}
library(bibliometrix)
```

```{r}
M_scopus <- convert2df("ajustes_BD/base_scopus_consolidada.csv", dbsource = "scopus", format = "csv")
```
```{r}
write.table(M_scopus, "M_scopus_rstudio.csv", sep = ";", row.names = FALSE)
```


```{r}
M_ieee <- convert2df("ajustes_BD/base_ieee_adaptada_scopus.csv", dbsource = "scopus", format = "csv")
```
```{r}
write.table(M_ieee, "M_ieee_rstudio.csv", sep = ";", row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
M_wos <- convert2df("ajustes_BD/base_wos_consolidada.txt", dbsource = "wos", format = "plaintext")
```
```{r}
write.table(M_wos, "M_wos_rstudio.csv", sep = ";", row.names = FALSE)
```



```{r}
M_final <- mergeDbSources(M_scopus,M_ieee, M_wos, remove.duplicated = TRUE)
```

```{r}
write.table(M_final, "dadosbiblio_rstudio.csv", sep = ";", row.names = FALSE)
```
